players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "I don't believe Alice. If she really investigated me, why accuse so quickly? She's probably the mafioso framing me."
Charlie: "Alice, why did you reveal your investigation so early? Diana, why would Alice lie if she's the detective?"
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is mafioso. Charlie, I revealed early because we have no time to waste with only 4 players. Diana is trying to deflect."
Diana: "Charlie, I agree with you—Alice's rush to accuse feels off. If she's the detective, why not more proof? We should vote her out to be safe."
Charlie: "I believe Alice is the detective. Diana's deflection feels desperate. We should vote Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
